flags.text: This project guide will not appear in search results but can still be viewed by anyone!

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
How to Repair Nintendo DS Lite (NDSL) Touch Screen

Find high quality inexpensive replacement nintendo ds Touch screens at the Nintendo Repair Shop Inc, along with any other nintendo ds lite repair parts you may need.

You would also need the Nintendo DS Lite Replacement Shell for this repair.

Keep tuned for more nindentdo dsi repair tutorials for your nintendo dsi. Thanks For Watching.
